active_learning.discussion_prompt: In a group discussion, debate the challenges (e.g., trust issues, data sensitivity) versus benefits (e.g., collective defense) of cross-sector intelligence exchange. Use real-world examples like ransomware attacks spanning finance and healthcare sectors to support your arguments.

distractor_protocol.step: Identify common misconceptions about the topic
Ensure distractors are similar in length and complexity
Include partial truths that require deeper understanding
